plot: A metaphor for the representation of women in the history of cinema and media, The Optometrist is a story about an eye doctor who gets what he deserves from his female patients.
title: The Optometrist
plot_es: A metaphor for the representation of women in the history of cinema and media, The Optometrist is a story about an eye doctor who gets what he deserves from his female patients.
plot_en: A metaphor for the representation of women in the history of cinema and media, The Optometrist is a story about an eye doctor who gets what he deserves from his female patients.
